metadata.name: GINAKEV FARMS: A Regenerative Agroforestry Hub for Eco Restoration
metadata.description:
GINAKEV FARMS: Restoring Land & Ecosystems through Agroforestry

üìç Location: Amalla Community, Udenu LGA, Enugu State, Nigeria‚Ä®
‚û§ Focus Areas: Reforestation | Land Restoration | Agroforestry | Community Empowerment

Cultivating a Regenerative Future‚Ä®Ginakev Farms is dedicated to restoring degraded land, increasing tree cover, and supporting sustainable livelihoods. With 100 plots (‚âà11.48 acres / 4.65 hectares) secured for conservation and regenerative agriculture, we are integrating agroforestry practices that benefit both the environment and the local economy.

Since 2023, we have focused on cashew tree conservation, protecting mature trees from deforestation and expanding cultivation.
* 5 plots (‚âà0.57 acres / 0.23 hectares) contain existing cashew trees preserved for biodiversity and soil health.
* 15 plots (‚âà1.72 acres / 0.70 hectares) now host 82 newly planted cashew trees as part of reforestation efforts.
Scaling Impact & Future Goals
* In 2025, we plan to establish a structured palm tree plantation (643 trees) on 80 plots (‚âà9.18 acres / 3.72 hectares).
* Long-term vision: Expand to 800 plots (‚âà91.8 acres / 37.2 hectares) for a 5,000-tree palm reforestation project.

Why This Matters‚Ä®By restoring forests, improving soil health, and securing land tenure through a Certificate of Occupancy (C of O), Ginakev Farms is pioneering sustainable agroforestry that benefits both nature and local farmers‚Äîcreating a scalable, climate-positive impact."

data.title: GG23: Hypercerts for Nature Stewards
data.description: Proof of impact links found for this ecocert in the "Hypercerts for Nature Stewards" GG23 funding round.
